name: Blue Diesel
description: Daughter of indica-dominant Blueberry and sativa-dominant NYC Diesel, Blue Diesel (also known as Blue City Diesel) falls on the slightly indica side with a pleasant, moderate to long-lasting body buzz. Thanks to its Blueberry genetics, this flower emanates a light berry aroma that is smooth, expansive, and fast-acting. This strain is optimal for daytime and comes with little to no fatigue or increased appetite, making it a desirable option for medical marijuana patients. Originally produced by Breeder’s Choice, this plant may provide just the relaxation you need.
descriptionPlain: Daughter of indica-dominant Blueberry and sativa-dominant NYC Diesel, Blue Diesel (also known as Blue City Diesel) falls on the slightly indica side with a pleasant, moderate to long-lasting body buzz. Thanks to its Blueberry genetics, this flower emanates a light berry aroma that is smooth, expansive, and fast-acting. This strain is optimal for daytime and comes with little to no fatigue or increased appetite, making it a desirable option for medical marijuana patients. Originally produced by Breeder’s Choice, this plant may provide just the relaxation you need.
aka: New Blue Diesel, Blue City Diesel

highlightedReviews.text:
Fantastic, uplifting high - it takes away my neuropathic pain for hours and simultaneously makes me energetic and euphoric - damn fine attributes for one dealing with major depression that has been ameliorated not one whit by Rx anti-depressants.
Toking up on Blue D on a bad morning can turn the day around and your frown upside-down!  Unequivocal recommendation for treating nerve pain and depression.

This is a really nice balanced hybrid for the Indica enthusiast. I‚Äôm used to the Diesel family, & always find them hard hitting when grown properly (esp. a good Sour Diesel), however THIS is hard hitting in a focused grounding manner, that is very relaxing. 10/10 üíöüèÜ‚ú®

articles.title: 5 Soulful Blues Albums to Listen to While High
articles.author: Rae Lland
articles.text:
The blues is a timeless genre full of heart and soul. Starting in the 19th¬†century, blues formed in black communities of the deep south and has strong roots in African musical traditions. Early blues songs were accompanied by lyrics recounting experiences of racial discrimination and other similar hardships faced by black Americans. The genre has persisted through the years, often being combined with elements of jazz, soul, rock, spirituals, and R&B.

Whatever form it takes, the blues is a genre that grabs you by the heart and demands an emotional response. Below, enjoy five impactful blues albums with our recommended strains and tune in to your emotional center.
Southern Avenue by Southern Avenue
(Spotify)
Strain Pairing Recommendation: Bluniverse
Southern Avenue released its lively self-titled album in 2017 and burst onto the blues scene with a refreshing style. The 10-track album features a full electric band, backup vocals, and versatile lead singer Tierinii Jackson, who wows with her strong, harmonious voice. Jackson is joined by her sister Tikyra Jackson on drums, Ori Naftaly on guitar, Jeremy Powell on keys, and Gage Markey on bass. Together, the five create an upbeat, energetic soundscape on Southern Avenue with an added influence of soul and R&B.
Find Bluniverse Nearby
Didn‚Äôt It Rain by Amy Helm
(Spotify)
Strain Pairing Recommendation: Blue Lights
Amy Helm released her breakout album, Didn‚Äôt It Rain, in 2015, and has left fans eager for her next project. Helm‚Äôs voice, light with a tinge of roughness, is a powerful instrument that pulls your heart out of your chest with each upward lilt. Didn‚Äôt It Rain has a southern blues feel with elements of rock that keep it fresh and interesting with each new track. Helm‚Äôs lyrics are engaging and soulful, making it a joy to sing along and pour your emotions into every note.
Find Blue Lights Nearby

The Marcus King Band by The Marcus King Band
(Spotify)
Strain Pairing Recommendation: Blue Diesel
The Marcus King Band¬†is a powerful, hard-hitting album released in 2016, and also marks frontman Marcus King‚Äôs second album. Relatively new to the scene, The Marcus King Band has swept the blues world by storm, with its album reaching No. 2 on Billboard‚Äôs blues album chart. The Marcus Kind Band has an intricately rich sound accompanied by gritty heart and King‚Äôs soulful, raw vocals. Each track on the album features the band‚Äôs perfectly orchestrated and impactful instrumentation with a sweet, mournful essence of blues.
Find Blue Diesel Nearby
By My Side by Kat Wright
(Spotify)
Strain Pairing Recommendation: Blue Mystic
By My Side, released in 2016, is Kat Wright‚Äôs first album, and it wastes no time getting right to the heart of the matter. Wright‚Äôs soulful, longing voice is effortless, whisking you away and holding you close. The music shoots straight to your center as it churns with emotion, all while the eight-piece band captures your attention with playful transitions. By My Side is a breakout album that carves out a prominent spot for Wright and her band in the world of blues.
Find Blue Mystic Nearby

Migration Blues by Eric Bibb
(Spotify)
Strain Pairing Recommendation: Blue Dragon
Migration Blues is smooth like silk. This acoustic blues album, released in 2017, is a raw, more organic approach to blues that eases you back in time to a simpler place. Eric Bibb‚Äôs voice is pristine and rich as he sings over his melodic guitar playing. Occasionally accompanied by harmonica, the album is stripped down but drips so heavily with emotion that it feels full and rounded. It‚Äôs the perfect collection of songs to sink into after a long day, cradling you as it drifts you away from your hardships in every note.
Find Blue Dragon Nearby

articles.title: The 13 Best Cannabis Strains for Parties
articles.author: Brett Konen
articles.text:
A lot of people think of alcohol as the classic social lubricant. For some of us, it is. Alcohol can loosen us up, make us chatty and animated, and wash away social anxiety. It‚Äôs also often readily available at social occasions. Meanwhile, many people avoid cannabis use during social events‚Äîfor one thing, it‚Äôs generally not served, and for another, many can recall a time cannabis made them paranoid or sleepy at a party, and don‚Äôt want to have that happen again.

Luckily, with the right strains you can avoid the unwanted effects mentioned above. We used the advanced filters in Leafly‚Äôs strain explorer to get started, sorting to include strains with the happiest, most talkative highs, and to exclude any strains that make users anxious, paranoid, or sleepy. (If only alcohol‚Äôs drawbacks were so easy to filter out, am I right?)
We‚Äôve curated the resultant list with our in-house expertise, vetting all suggestions against our own experiences and ensuring there‚Äôs a pick for every type of party. Attendees heading to any social occasion will find something below.
And the awards for the best party cannabis strains go to‚Ä¶
Chocolope
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: All occasions.
DNA Genetics developed Chocolope by crossing¬†Chocolate Thai¬†with¬†Cannalope Haze to create their homage to the super-popular Chocolate strains of the 1980s. The hefty¬†sativa¬†buds give¬†earthy, sweet¬†coffee¬†flavors that provide a dreamy, cerebral effect. It‚Äôs known around the Leafly office as ‚Äúthe party strain,‚Äù and for good reason‚Äîit‚Äôs basically impossible to be unhappy or introverted with such a feel-good high.

White Russian
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Dinner parties.
Originally created by Dutch breeders Serious Seeds, White Russian is a cross of two legendary strains,¬†White Widow¬†and¬†AK-47. An indica-dominant hybrid, it won the¬†High Times¬†Cannabis Cup ‚ÄúBest Overall‚Äù¬†in 1996. White Russian is an extremely fragrant plant, and with a flavor that is smooth and spicy with undertones of skunk and earth, and its high is quite cerebral (especially for an indica-dominant strain), making it great for conversation with those around you.
Tangie
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Cocktail parties.
Another fave among the Leafly crew, particularly for group gatherings after work, Tangie is a fantastic offering from DNA Genetics in Amsterdam. This strain is a remake of sorts of the popular version of¬†Tangerine Dream¬†that was sought-after in the 1990s, with genetics derived from a cross of¬†California Orange¬†and a¬†Skunk¬†hybrid. Its citrus heritage is the most evident in its refreshing tangerine aroma.
Blue Goo
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Friends and family gatherings.
Blue Goo is a sativa-dominant hybrid that‚Äôs a cross between the famous hybrid¬†Blue Dream¬†and indica¬†Afgoo. A moderate to high potency yields uplifting effects that are standard for sativas, but not excessively energetic thanks to Afgoo‚Äôs contribution as well as the mellow nature of Blue Dream. This strain is appropriate for day or nighttime consumption and provides smooth smoke and berry flavor.

Sour Lemon OG
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Birthday parties.
Bred by Emerald Triangle Seeds, Sour Lemon OG is a sativa-dominant¬†hybrid¬†cross between¬†California Sour¬†and¬†Lemon OG. This 65%¬†sativa¬†strain is named after its aromatic sour smell with recognizable notes of¬†lemon,¬†lime, and¬†apple. Sour Lemon OG elevates the mind and body simultaneously, making this a natural go-to strain for¬†celebrations, social engagements, or even just a busy day.
Blue Diesel
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Happy hour.
Daughter of indica-dominant¬†Blueberry¬†and sativa-dominant¬†NYC Diesel, Blue Diesel (also known as Blue City Diesel) falls slightly on the indica side of things with a pleasant,¬†moderate- to long-lasting body buzz (perfect if you want to extend the happy for more than an hour). Thanks to its Blueberry genetics, this flower emanates a light berry aroma that is smooth, expansive, and fast-acting. This strain is optimal for daytime use, and relaxes the consumer in social settings without putting you to sleep.
Pez
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Cannabis-focused parties.
Pez is an¬†indica¬†daughter of¬†Afghani¬†and Pakistani strains. These¬†sweet, frosty buds offer the¬†relaxation¬†typical of indicas without the drowsiness, making the strain great for daytime use.¬†We recommend this one as a shareable contribution to any 420-friendly gathering‚Äîit‚Äôs also on our list of the Top 100 Must-Try Strains, meaning it will be a particularly popular addition to any event with open cannabis consumption.

Orange Bud
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Hosting.
Matching plenty of social energy with a dose of subtle relaxation, this strain is perfect for gatherings where you‚Äôre in charge and want to stay upbeat and level-headed. First bred in 1980s by Dutch Passion, Orange Bud is a combination of two members of the 100%¬†Skunk¬†family. With bright orange hairs coating the surface, it showcases scents of orange and nectarine.
Blueberry Headband
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Parties you don‚Äôt want to attend.
Several renditions of the Blueberry Headband hybrid are known to exist, but the original Blueberry Headband from NorCal‚Äôs Emerald Triangle Seeds is the most well-known. It‚Äôs a 50/50 indica-sativa hybrid that smells of diesel, berries and pepper, and it produces a perfectly balanced high with a nice cerebral rush and relaxing body effects. This is great for staying sufficiently present while mentally floating high above any social event you wish you didn‚Äôt have to attend (think work parties, baby showers, and so on).
Banana Kush
Strain type: Hybrid
Best for: Potlucks.
This legendary West Coast strain crosses¬†Ghost OG¬†and¬†Skunk Haze¬†to create an¬†indica-dominant¬†hybrid¬†that tastes and smells like a bushel of fresh¬†bananas (and will whet your appetite if there‚Äôs food around). Although it leans towards an¬†indica genetically, the effects are balanced by the¬†Haze‚Äôs¬†mellow¬†sativa¬†buzz that provides a¬†relaxed¬†sense of¬†euphoria.¬†Banana Kush also help its consumers remain¬†talkative¬†in social settings.

Durban Cookies
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Loud parties.
Durban Cookies is the¬†Durban Poison-dominant¬†phenotype¬†of¬†GSC. Known for its invigorating mental energy and body buzz, Durban Cookies offers a more energizing experience, making this sativa-dominant strain a top choice throughout the day and into the evening, particularly if you‚Äôre headed to a high-energy event where you‚Äôll be surrounded by music, people, and movement.
Bubblegum Kush
Strain type: Indica
Best for: Low-key get-togethers.
This strain is for laid-back social situations; it‚Äôll leave you relaxed and comfy on any given couch, but also chatty and ready to hang with whoever sits down next to you. An 80% indica strain from Bulldog Seeds in the Netherlands, Bubblegum Kush is a cross between¬†Bubble Gum¬†and an undisclosed Kush, and has a satisfyingly sour smell and flavor.
Strawberry
Strain type: Sativa
Best for: Being a plus-one.
Originally bred in the Netherlands, Strawberry is a mostly sativa cannabis strain with a pungent fruity scent and uplifting effects. Consumers prone to anxiety choose Strawberry for its stress-relieving qualities without the jarring paranoia common among high-THC strains (which makes it great for small talk with people you don‚Äôt know). Comfortable and relaxing, Strawberry brings with it a hearty dose of physical and mental ease.
